Dear Mr Stabile:
Attached is the Addendum to the Original Licensing Study Report for the above
referenced facility.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and feel free to contact me with
any questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please feel free to contact Deborah L. Clark, Area Manager, at (906) 228-
2852.

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CP170201061
Licensee Name: Michigan Department of Human Services
Licensee Address: 235 S. Grand Avenue
Lansing, MI 48909
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 373-3768
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Christopher Stabile, Administrator
Ismael Ahmed, Designee
Name of Facility: Chippewa County DHS
Facility Address: 463 East Three Mile Road
Sault Ste Marie, MI 49783
Facility Telephone #: (906) 635-4102
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, FIA
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Chippewa County DHS requested and it has been approved to change the terms of
their approval to include the addition of Adoption Evaluation and Adoption
Placement.
III. Methodology
Chippewa County DHS requested the change in terms and submitted Program
Statements and Program Policies on 11/04/2010 to this licensing consultant.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Chippewa County DHS submitted Program Statements and Program Policies. These
were approved and the terms of the approval were changed.
V. Recommendation
I recommend that the terms of the Approval for Chippewa County DHS be changed
to include Adoption Evaluation and Adoption Placement.
11/04/2010
________________________________________
Don Collier Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
November 8, 2010
________________________________________
Linda Lee for Deborah Clark Date
Linda Lee for Area Manager
